daily_fact: New York City socialite Jean Shafiroff is selling her stunning Florida home for $17.2 million, featuring two kitchens, two bars, and two libraries, showcasing the city's vibrant lifestyle.
topline_md: This weekend, NYC faces dangerously low temperatures that could lead to frostbite within minutes, while the city grapples with early storm-related fatalities and rising pediatric flu deaths, alongside ongoing discussions about healthcare staffing shortages and public safety measures.

community.title: Community
